name: Paneer pakoda
description: Paneer pakoda is made by batter frying Indian cottage cheese aka paneer.

name: Plain dosa
description: Plain Dosa is a quick meal recipe made with a fermented batter of rice.....

name: Gwaramari
description: Gwaramari is a Newa cuisine which literally means round bread- “Gwara” meaning round and “mari” meaning traditional bread.[1] The food is popular in Kathmandu area. It is eaten in breakfast usually served with a milk tea.

name: Egg Roll
description: An egg roll is a cylindrical, savory roll with shredded cabbage, chopped pork, and other fillings inside a thickly-wrapped wheat flour skin, which is fried in hot oil..

name: Aloo paratha
description: Aloo parathas consist of unleavened dough rolled with a mixture of mashed potato and spices, which is cooked on a hot tawa with butter or ghee

name: Chicken friedrice
description: Fried rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, seafood, or meat.

name: Dhido
description: Dhindo (Nepali: ढिँडो [ɖʱĩɽo] ( listen)) is a meal prepared in Nepal. It is prepared by gradually adding flour to boiling water while stirring.

name: Dhaal bhat
description: Dal bhat is a traditional meal of Nepal. It consists of steamed rice and a cooked lentil or other pulses stew called dal. It is a staple food in these countries

name: Thakali Khana
description: Thakali cuisine uses locally grown buckwheat, barley, millet and dal, as well as rice, maize and dal imported from lower regions to the south.

name: Chicken Momo
description: hicken Momo is a dumpling made of all-purpose flour and filled with  meat. Inspired by Tibetan dumplings, the dish is a very popular Nepali street food.

name: Khashi ko Sekuwa
description: Sekuwa is a Nepalese specialty dish consisting of grilled and skewered  he-goat meat. Before grilling, the meat is combined with fresh herbs and spices. It is one of the most popular street food items in the country.

name: Sel Roti
description: A fusion of doughnut and bagel, Sel Roti is one of the most sought after snack in Nepal during festivals like Tihar and Dashain. It is a circular rice flour bread which is deeply fried to make it crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside.

name: Dal Bhat Tarkari
description: Dal Bhat Tarkari is the staple meal of Nepali people. Although rice with lentil soup and curry is the go to meal in South Asia – the taste of authentic Nepali ‘Dal Bhat’ is quite unique.

name: Momo
description: Momo are steamed dumpling with variation of fillings inside. It is native to the Southwest Chinese region of Tibet, Nepal, Bhutan, and parts of India.

name: Roti
description: Roti (also known as chapati) is a round flatbread native to the Indian subcontinent made from stoneground whole wheat flour, traditionally known as gehu ka atta, and water that is combined into a dough.

name: Wo or Bara
description: Bara is a traditional Newari food that is cooked on a hot pan using blended lentil (beans). It is basically a lentil pancake and commonly used for ‘Sagun’ (to wish Good Luck) in the Newari culture.
